item.title: Pollution, Weather Linked to Atopic Dermatitis
item.description: Air pollution and temperature extremes were linked to increased atopic dermatitis visits, in a meta-analysis. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Skin Care Routines Can Cause Teens More Harm Than Good
item.description: Pediatricians should counsel teens on the hazards of facial treatment fads. Medscape Medical News
